TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HasRunnableWorkflowEvent extends System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceEvent`1<class System.Activities.DurableInstancing.HasRunnableWorkflowEvent>
Public NotInheritable Class HasRunnableWorkflowEvent Inherits InstancePersistenceEvent(Of HasRunnableWorkflowEvent)

summary.span: 表示 SQL 工作流程執行個體存放區引發的事件，該事件會通知工作流程主機持續性資料庫中具有可執行的執行個體。

span.span: Represents an event that the SQL Workflow Instance Store raises to notify workflow hosts about the existence of runnable instances in the persistence database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體是*runnable*，如果它不是暫停的狀態或已完成的狀態，並且滿足以下條件：An instance is *runnable*, if it is not in the suspended state or the completed state and satisfies the following conditions: - 執行個體已解除鎖定，並具有已過期的暫止計時器。The instance is unlocked and has a pending timer that has expired. - 執行個體已解除鎖定，其狀態為**執行**。The instance is unlocked and its status is **Executing**. - 執行個體上有無效的鎖定。The instance has an invalid lock on it. 執行個體存放區應定期搜尋可執行的執行個體，而這些執行個體隸屬於使用該存放區的工作流程主機。An instance store should periodically search for runnable instances that belong to a workflow host that uses the store. 在符合工作流程主機型別的持續性存放區中，找到可執行的執行個體時，應引發 。It should raise the when it finds a runnable instance in the persistence store that matches its workflow host type. 如果執行個體存放區在持續性存放區中找不到可執行的執行個體，則應繼續監控持續性存放區，以尋找任何可執行的執行個體。If the instance store does not find a runnable instance in the persistence store, it should continue to monitor the persistence store for any runnable instances. 引發 HasRunnableWorkflowEvent 後，執行個體存放區應停止監控持續性存放區中可執行的執行個體，直到收到和執行 為止。After raising the HasRunnableWorkflowEvent, the instance store should stop monitoring the persistence store for runnable instances until it receives and executes the . 只有在 TryLoadRunnableWorkflowCommand 執行未傳回任何可執行的執行個體時，監控才會繼續執行。The monitoring continues only if the TryLoadRunnableWorkflowCommand execution does not return any runnable instances. 當工作流程主機收到 HasRunnableWorkflowEvent 時，會針對執行個體存放區執行 ，將執行個體載入至記憶體。When a workflow host receives the HasRunnableWorkflowEvent, it executes the against the instance store to load the instance into the memory.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class.
